name: iw profile
author: Hamid Reza Alinia

sections.description:
iw profile widget that allows a user to login, register, reset their password, see recent activity, time, post and comment count, author info, in one place. You can also customize wordpress mail from name and address.

Features

  • A login and registration widget for your blog
  • Tabs/links for logged out users include login, register, and ‘lost password’.
  • Captcha functionality included.
  • Logged in users can see their name, avatar, logged in date, and comments/posts since sign in.
  • User can see his/her recent viewed posts and recent comments made by him/her.
  • User can see his ID, First joined date, total number of his/her posts, total number of comments made by him/her, user level, posts feed, comments feed.
  • AJAX validation makes this thing run smooth
  • Shortcode & PHP Code if you don’t want to use widget
  • Options page for customizing the plugin
  • User can add extra link
  • This plugin is so light
  • Smart & nice looking. You love it.
  • Nice warning & success system.
  • You can translate this plugin.

Translations

Available translations are listed in the plugin’s admin page

If you have made a translation file please send it to this mail

Why dont you rate the plugin if you like it !! ðŸ™‚

Our team IDehweb.
sections.installation:
Automatic

  • In the admin panel plugins page click Add New
  • Search for iw profile
  • Find iw profile in the list an click Install Now
  • Click OK when prompted
  • Enjoy!

Manual

  • Extract iw-profile.zip to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  • In the admin panel under plugins activate iw profile.
  • Enjoy!
sections.faq: You will find the F.A.Q.s in the admin page.

short_description: iw profile is a login/register form and profile which you need to set frontend beautiful profile and special use when you have set up woocommerce.
